alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 9:02PM EST until January 30 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Shoal River Near Crestview affecting Okaloosa County. For the Shoal River...including Crestview...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Shoal River near Crestview. * WHEN...From Monday evening to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, Water in yards on Sowel Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 6.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to flood stage tomorrow evening. It will then fall to 7.7 feet Tuesday morning. It will rise above flood stage again Tuesday morning to 8.3 feet late Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage again late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
